subtests.name: hoverpopup attribute shows a pop-up with popup=auto
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is already showing (popup=auto)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is moved out of the document (popup=auto)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when target changes (popup=auto)
hoverpopup attribute shows a pop-up with popup=hint
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is already showing (popup=hint)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is moved out of the document (popup=hint)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when target changes (popup=hint)
hoverpopup attribute shows a pop-up with popup=manual
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is already showing (popup=manual)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when pop-up is moved out of the document (popup=manual)
hoverpopup attribute does nothing when target changes (popup=manual)
